DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of the prolongation of luteal support on the ongoing pregnancy rate (beyond 12 weeks of gestation )in recFSH/GnRH antagonist cycles.
DOC.brief_title: Prolongation of Progesterone Supplementation in Antagonist Cycles and Pregnancy Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Age equal or less than 39 Body mass index between 1829 kg/m2 Presence of both ovaries Basal hormonal values on day 2 of the cycle Embryotransfer day3 or day5 1 to 3 cycles Endometriosis stage 3 Polycystic ovarian syndrome Frozen or testicular sperm
